text: "Once in a Lifetime" is a 1981 song by Talking Heads and was taken from their fourth studio album Remain in Light. It went to number 16 in Ireland, number 14 in the United Kingdom, number 24 in the Netherlands and number 28 in Canada. The live version went to number 91 in the United States and number 15 in New Zealand. ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:Art pop songs Category:Talking Heads songs
title: Once in a Lifetime (Talking Heads song)
